name: Ytivarg's Escape
description:
Come say hello to little Ytivarg! Locked up in conspiracy and totally unaware of the powers he has at his disposal it is down to you to free little Ytivarg. The only problem is you dont want Ytivarg to know of your plan! If he becomes cognitive then science will never be able to fully understand how and why Ytivarg is capable of what he is capable of!

Controls:

Left Arrow - Walk Left

Right Arrow - Walk Right

Spacebar - Jump

Play this current WIP physics based fun platformer. There is a alot more story to be revealed and sounds and voice acting too!

The game is compatible with desktop, iOS and Android. Fully touchscreen compatible and working UI only mobiles can see. Desktop user get the cleaner look with keyboard controls.
